metadata.name: The Journey Beyond Now
metadata.description: The painting depicts a lone figure standing at the end of a winding path, with the past behind him. The path is divided into two distinct halves - one half shrouded in darkness, the other bathed in light. The figure's gaze is fixed firmly ahead, towards the horizon where a glimmer of enlightenment can be seen. Despite the struggles and hardships of the journey, the figure stands tall and resolute, knowing that he is now on the path to inner peace and understanding. The painting is a testament to the strength of the human spirit and the enduring power of hope and perseverance.
